Sistem E-Budgeting DKI Diperbaiki, Anies Baswedan Ingin Fitur Ini
02 Nov 2019, 06:53 by Taufiq Siddiq, Dwi Arjanto
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta -Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan berencana bakal menjadikan sistem E Budgeting DKI lebih interaktif. Yakni dengan menyediakan fitur untuk berkomentar.
"Upgrading kemudian adalah akses bahkan bukan hanya bisa dilihat seperti sekarang tapi juga publil nanti bisa memberikan komentar," ujar Anies Baswedan di Balai Kota Jakarta Pusat, Jumat 1 November 2019.
Anies mengatakan fitur berkomentar tersebut untuk meningkatkan faktor transparansi publik terhadap proses penganggaran DKI hingga pengawasan.
Anies menyebutkan faktor yang dipehatikan selanjutnya adalah keamanan data serta sitem yang meminmalisir terjadinya dampak dari human eror. karena saat ini kata dia kekeliruan dalam memasukan data masih mungkin terjadi.
Mantan Mendikbud tersebut memisalkan anggaran Rp 82 miliar untuk pembelian lem Aibon yang secara logis angka tersebut tidak bisa diterima. Anies merencanakan di sistem yang baru nanti angka- angka yang tidak rasional tersebut bisa ditolak oleh sistem.
Pemprov DKI Jakarta berencana bakal meluncurkan sistem pembaharuan E-Budgeting itu pada bulan depan. "Detialnya nanti pas peluncuran bulan Desember," demikian Anies Baswedan.

DKI's E-Budgeting System Is Improved, Anies Baswedan Wants This Feature
02 Nov 2019, 06:53 by Taufiq Siddiq, Dwi Arjanto
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan plans to make DKI's E Budgeting system more interactive. Namely by providing features for commenting.
"Upgrading then is that access can not only be seen as it is now, but also the public can comment later," Anies Baswedan said at the Central Jakarta City Hall, Friday, November 1, 2019.
Anies said the commenting feature was to increase the factor of public transparency of the DKI's budgeting process to supervision.
Anies said the next factor to be considered was data security and systems that minimized the impact of human error. because at this time he said mistakes in entering data are still possible.
The former Minister of Education and Culture has assumed a budget of Rp. 82 billion for the purchase of Aibon glue, which is logically unacceptable. Anies planned that in the new system later the irrational numbers could be rejected by the system.
The DKI Jakarta Provincial Government plans to launch the E-Budgeting renewal system next month. "The details will be on the December launch," said Anies Baswedan.
